author: bdelacretaz
msg: STANBOL-2 - initial import from the donated IKS project code

author: fmeschbe
msg: Cannot use the path info because the getResource method is used to resolve other paths while handling requests, for example the target path of a move operation. This target also includes the servlet context and servlet paths as prefixes but of course using the request path info here is wrong. Hence use a prefix created on first request from the context path and servlet path information present in the request
